SKT_FIRST.name: Simple Self-defense
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: とっておきの護身武器
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどシールド量がUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 부여합니다. 실드량은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使生命值最低的友军获得<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。自身<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>越高,则护盾量越高。

SKT_SECOND.name: Basic First Aid
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) Activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color> effect when an ally is inflicted with a <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color>.\nRemoves <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from all allies and <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> for <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)味方に<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>がある場合、<color=#28d9ed>【迅速対応】</color>を発動する。\n【迅速対応】:味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除し、<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復させる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color> 적용 시 <color=#28d9ed>신속 대응</color> 효과가 발동합니다.\n아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1</color>개 해제하고 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (触发效果)友军获得<color=#28d9ed>弱化效果</color>时,将发动<color=#28d9ed>迅速应对</color>效果。\n解除全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>1</color>个<color=#28d9ed>弱化效果</color>,并使<color=#28d9ed>生命值</color>恢复<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: This Shot Won't Hurt
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> selected ally by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> and increases the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>回復させ、<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 使所选友军的<color=#28d9ed>生命值</color>恢复<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>,并使<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

4_zh: 防御力提升持续时间+1回合

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Reduces This Shot Won't Hurt Cooldown by 1 turns
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 【全然痛くないお注射】\nスキルターン-1ターン
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 完全不痛的注射冷却时间-1回合

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> of Max Health.\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the ally with the lowest Health. Barrier strength increases proportional to Tio's Max Health.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を、最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復させる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を付与する。【ティオ】の最大HPが高いほど効果がUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 만큼 회복시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 부여합니다. 티오의 최대 체력에 비례하여 효과가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,使生命值最低的友军<color=#28d9ed>生命值</color>恢复相当于生命值上限的<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使生命值最低的友军获得<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>效果。根据蒂欧的生命值上限等比提升护盾效果。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
